scripts.build: npm run install_all && npm run build_all
scripts.build_all: npm run build --prefix ./web/ && npm run build --prefix ./server/ && npm run build --prefix ./core/ && rm server/src/public/ -rf && cp web/dist/ server/dist/public -R
scripts.install_all: npm install && npm install --prefix ./web/ && npm install --prefix ./core/ && npm install --prefix ./server/
